titles.title: Girl Scrambling up the Wall / Teke Teke and Bun Bun / Hair Tangled in the Horizontal Bar / The Wrath of Kokkuri-san / Sealed Spirits / A Sticky Girl Laughs / A Sad Father`s Love Story / Yellow Hand / Ghost Holding a Baby / Late Night Locker / Boy Drowned in the Pool / The Eternal Staircase / Ghost Kicking Its Own Head / The Spirit of the Music Room
